div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h3: Welcome to the Milbank School District! We are committed to our mission statement:
“Empowering All Students to Meet Life’s Transitions and Future Challenges"

img.alt: Click Here to View the Milbank Class of 2020 Strong Video!

a.span: Click Here to View the Milbank Class of 2020 Strong Video!

div.p:
Koch School Students & Parents: we've added a Kindness tab to our Covid-19 link on the school webpage. The purpose is to spread kindness and positivity during this time!
Koch School Distance Learning Page: https://sites.google.com/msdk12.us/covid-19-distance-learning/home
To submit a positive message about students or teachers click here: https://youuplift.com/koch-elementary-submission-form/
To view the rotating display of positive messages click here: https://youuplift.com/koch-elementary-positive-messages/
In honor of our Seniors and our healthcare workers, the AB Campbell Stadium lights will be turned on this Friday, April 24th, at 8:20pm(2020 military time) and will remain on for 20 minutes.
Koch School Parents: the pickup line is open until 4:00 pm today, at the front door of Koch School, if you have not already picked up your child's learning materials.

The next pickup date for learning materials at Koch School is scheduled for Monday, April 20 from 7:30 am - 4:00 pm. All students in Preschool, Kindergarten, First Grade, Third Grade, and Fifth Grade will have materials for pickup unless notified by your child’s classroom teacher.

Good Afternoon. I know that most of you have heard, but, sadly, I need to inform you that Governor Noem is recommending closing schools for the remainder of the year. The SDHSAA is also cancelling on winter and spring activities at this time as well. We will continue our distance education. Students need to continue to make progress and communicate with your teachers on a regular basis. We will be in communication about future material pickups as well as collecting materials at the end of our regular school year. Distance learning will continue through May 20th. Seniors work will need to be completed by May 15th and all other students by May 20th. Meal service will also continue during this time. There will be no meals on April 10th and the 13th as we were not scheduled to have school on these days.
Thank you,

Milbank School District
1001 East Park Ave
Milbank, SD 57252
Phone: 605-432-5579
Fax: 605-432-4137
